amendment.description: Amendment imposes a moratorium on increasing annual percentage rates, fees and finance charges, as well as a moratorium on changing the terms for repayment of outstanding balances on credit card accounts, for nine months after enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 111-326 to impose a moratorium on increasing annual percentage rates, fees and finance charges, as well as a moratorium on changing the terms for repayment of outstanding balances on credit card accounts, for nine months after enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sutton amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 173 (Roll no. 849).
